title: Confess Your Love
overview: Xu Huanxi, a modern girl, drank her sorrows because of a broken relationship, and woke up to find that she was actually in an ancient wedding room. I thought it was a dream and finally married a male god, but I didn't expect that the reality is that I have traveled through time, and the groom is still a strange playboy prince Song Kuo! Xu Huanxi wanted to go back to modern times by drinking, but she actually traveled to a country that banned alcohol.
